name: NSMachPort.Options
desc: Used to remove access rights to a mach port when the NSMachPort object is invalidated or destroyed.

items.name: static var deallocateReceiveRight: NSMachPort.Options
items.desc: Remove a receive right when the NSMachPort object is invalidated or destroyed.

items.name: static var deallocateSendRight: NSMachPort.Options
items.desc: Deallocate a send right when the NSMachPort object is invalidated or destroyed.
